originalTitle: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
title: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
content: The government has begun a vaccination programme but officials have been blamed for a slow response.

originalTitle: Clashes in Albania as protesters demand PM Rama resign
title: Clashes in Albania as protesters demand PM Rama resign
content: Violence breaks out near parliament as demonstrators demand accountability in a corruption investigation.

originalTitle: UK weighs removing ex-Prince Andrew from succession line amid Epstein probe
title: UK weighs removing ex-Prince Andrew from succession line amid Epstein probe
content: The report comes as police widen investigations into former prince, including questioning his close protection teams.

originalTitle: Where are the most endangered languages in the world?
title: Where are the most endangered languages in the world?
content: February 21 is World Mother Language Day. Al Jazeera looks at the most spoken languages and which ones are endangered.

originalTitle: Trump brings in new 10% tariff as Supreme Court rejects his global import taxes
title: Trump brings in new 10% tariff as Supreme Court rejects his global import taxes
content: The Supreme Court decision striking down some of Trump's most sweeping tariffs injects new uncertainty into global trade.

originalTitle: Trump lashes out at Supreme Court justices over tariffs ruling
title: Trump lashes out at Supreme Court justices over tariffs ruling
content: The six justices who voted against the tariffs, dealing a major blow to his signature economic policy, should be "absolutely ashamed", Trump said.

originalTitle: Trump says he is considering limited military strike on Iran
title: Trump says he is considering limited military strike on Iran
content: Trump's new threat came a day after he appeared to give Iran about 10 days to agree to a deal to curb its nuclear programme.

originalTitle: What's eating Arsenal? North London derby now a test of Gunners' 'bottle'
title: What's eating Arsenal? North London derby now a test of Gunners' 'bottle'
content: What's eating Arsenal? Sunday's North London derby is now a test of the Gunners' "bottle", says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

originalTitle: Glasner's Crystal Palace future in serious doubt
title: Glasner's Crystal Palace future in serious doubt
content: Sources tell BBC Sport that Crystal Palace's board is considering Oliver Glasner's future at the club.

originalTitle: Tudor '100%' convinced Spurs will avoid relegation
title: Tudor '100%' convinced Spurs will avoid relegation
content: New Tottenham head coach Igor Tudor says he is "100%" convinced Spurs will avoid relegation and still be in the Premier League next season.
